history.proof: hauto lq: on drew: off use: Z.divide_mul_r, Z.mul_comm, Z.mul_shuffle3, Z.mul_assoc, Z.divide_factor_r, Z.mul_1_l unfold: Z.divide.

original: intros a b Hab. apply Zdivide_bounds in Hab; [|intro Habs; discriminate]. apply divide_trans with (Z.abs a). - apply Zdivide_Zabs_l. apply Zdivide_Zabs_inv_l. apply divide_trans with a; [apply Zdivide_opp_l_rev | apply Hab]. - apply Zdivide_Zabs_inv_l. apply divide_trans with a; [apply Zdivide_opp_l | apply Hab].
